Detailed Description

VertexBuffer (farther VB) represents geometry container.

VB may contain various geometry data: vertex coordinates, vertex normals, triangle normals, two levels of UV coordinates (UV0 and UV1), vertex light intensity, indexes. VB may link to another VB with different Level of Detail. To access to VB, you need to lock it before. There is three types of locking: for reading only, for writing only and for reading and writing at the same time.

~VertexBuffer (   )  [protected]
 

Destructor.

Free all memory used by VB. Delete all geometry data.

Member Function Documentation

void AddLODVB (  ObjRef< VertexBuffer >  lod_vb_  ) 
 

Links LOD VB to this VB.

This function will add LOD VB into chain linked VBs by LOD radius increment.

Parameters:
lod_vb_ - pointer to linking LOD VB.

Bool CheckFormat (  Int  format_  ) 
 

Checks if VB format flag is set.

Parameters:
format_ - format flag for checking.
Returns:
Return True, if format flag is set, else - False.

Bool Copy (  VertexBuffer &  src_vb_,
Int  format_ = -1
) 
 

Copies data of given source VB to this VB.

Parameters:
src_vb_ - source VB.
format_ - format. Describe which data will be copied. If this parameter value is negative (by default), then all source VB data will be copied. If format_ has VertexBuffer_Format_LOD flag, than function will copy data from LOD VBs of source VB to LOD VBs of this VB (if it has their).
Returns:
Return True, if VB copied successful, else - False.

Bool Init (  Int  format_,
Word  vertex_count_,
Word  index_count_
) 
 

Initializes VB.

Sets format, vertex_count and index count. Computes and allocate necessary memory. Calling this function don't clear memory allocated before for VB, so you should call it only once. This function don't create linked LOD VB! You may create and link it manually.

Parameters:
format_ - VB format.
vertex_count_ - necessary vertex count.
index_count_ - necessary index count
Returns:
Return True, if initialization successful, else - False.

void Lock (  Int  lock_type  ) 
 

Locks VB.

Call this function before acces to VB.

Parameters:
lock_type - access flag (for reading, writing, reading & writing).

void Transform (  Matrix4fx *  transform  ) 
 

Transforms VB by transformation matrix.

Transformation matrix transforms vertexes (Vxyz), vertex normals (Nxyz) and triangle normals (TriNxyz).

Parameters:
transform - transformation matrix.

void UnLock (   ) 
 

Unlocks VB.

Call this function after all VB changes will made.
